name: Export Comments
description:
Feature List:

1. Export to Excel format with grouping of parent/child comments.

2. Filters added to export:

i. All comments

ii. New comments

iii. My comments

iv. Resolved comments

v. Unresolved comments

3. Error Handling and better guide on error.

4. View comments in Figma.

5. Design Documentation.

6. Design Governance.


Gain access to more features available on our new Dashboard. https://exportcomments.io

Get a birds eye view of figma comments and directly take action from the Dashboard.
